item.title: Code Review
item.description: Code review is a human communication process 3-steps process The developer who wrote the code creates a pull request (PR) and lets the team know that the PR was created. (Slack bot) Once the PR is created, someone else starts reviewing the code, in accordance with a guide providing rules, standards and processes. After one or two developers have reviewed the code, one or both steps should be followed:
